item.title: Holiday Replay - A Dumbgeons Christmas Carol
item.description: Next week, prepare yourselves for a new Holiday Presentation of the Dumb Dragons version of Sherlock Holmes and The Adventure of the Blue Carbuncle. But, until then join us as we revisit 2023's Holiday Special Presentation of A Dumbgeons Christmas Carol. All of your favourite adventurers are in the festive season to put on a community theatre adaptation of the Charles Dickens original... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/dumbgeonsanddragons

item.title: The Kids of Rutherford County - Ep. 4: Dedicated Public Servants
item.description: The lawyers settle with the county, which agrees to pay the kids who were wrongfully arrested and illegally jailed; the hard part is actually getting the kids paid. From Serial Productions and The New York Times in partnership with ProPublica and Nashville Public Radio, “The Kids of Rutherford County” is reported and hosted by Meribah Knight, a Peabody-award winning reporter based in the South. Feed: https://feeds.simplecast.com/xl36XBC2
